column5: Goin' to Jerry World? The Ballpark? Six Flags? Hurricane Harbor? Texas Live! (2017) Convention Center? Bowling Museum? Stay in my extra bedroom and enjoy very quick travel to and from these places. Walk or bring a bike to eliminate traffic concerns all together!  Quick and easy access to I-30 gets you to top destinations in Dallas & Ft. Worth also.
column8: 1.5 mi. from Stadiums & Theme Parks. Arlington, TX
